message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a great deal considering its value. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and it gives you a significant savings compared to my original offer. Let's find a middle ground and make this deal work.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,250. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can make a deal.
